Articles.Content:
i already talked about this on steam https://steamcommunity.com/app/220200/discussions/0/3044985412468944920/ but the post was abandoned so i posted here

also if you have any fixes make sure that it's not in the steam post

This is unfortunate. But people will need a lot more info before they can help. What are you running the game on in terms of hardware? Operating system? All that stuff. 

Also, your thread has been moved to the support section.
